entries.title: Cognitive Dissonance & Confirmation Bias  - Techlore Talks #3
entries.description:
How do cognitive dissonance and confirmation bias fit into privacy, security, FOSS, tech, and the world today? You all asked for more free-form, and here it is!

Referenced resources:
Cognititive Dissonace: https://www.verywellmind.com/what-is-cognitive-dissonance-2795012
Confirmation Bias: https://www.verywellmind.com/what-is-a-confirmation-bias-2795024
Growth EQ Podcast on this: https://thegrowtheq.com/how-to-change-your-mind/
Growth EQ on Guru Syndrom: https://thegrowtheq.com/how-to-spot-guru-syndrome-and-what-to-do-about-it/
(Yes, they're both longer than 45 minutes, still amazingly relevant topics that people should 100% listen to.)

Looking for Techlore Talks as a podcast? Join here: https://dispatch.techlore.tech/podcast
